attributes.action: politely ask every immigrant entering the UK to bring a bucket - so they can help us bail out the country - as our island sinks into the sea.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The weight of increase in population caused by mass immigration into the UK is forcing our island to sink into the sea.  This is evident by the rise in sea level around the UK and the increase in coastal erosion. We ask that the government should recognise this issue is caused by their policies and not climate change! 

The upside of this directive would be that all immigrants could fill their buckets with fresh water in Europe - so on arrival here, they can give it Southern Water to alleviate the drought - particularly in Kent.

Thank you.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
